questions.promptMd: Which rehearsal plan MOST improves delivery?

answers.contentMd: Bullet notes, timed run hitting 60–70% content, record and review
answers.feedbackMd: Locks pacing and transitions; feedback loop included.

answers.contentMd: Full script reading during the talk
answers.feedbackMd: Leads to monotone and lost eye contact.

answers.contentMd: No rehearsal to keep it spontaneous

questions.promptMd: Which note style is MOST effective?

answers.contentMd: Short bullet prompts with data points and transitions
answers.feedbackMd: Guides delivery while allowing eye contact.

questions.promptMd: True or False: Leave 30–40% of scheduled time for questions and discussion.

answers.feedbackMd: Correct. Ensures interaction and decision clarity.
